note: GDP per capita is expressed in [international-$](#dod:int_dollar_abbreviation) at 2021 prices.
title: Antidepressant drug consumption per 1,000 people vs. GDP per capita
subtitle: Daily intake of antidepressants per 1,000 people, calculated as the 'defined daily dose'. Gross domestic product (GDP) per capita is adjusted for inflation and for differences in living costs between countries.
